creator: Sumi Interactive
descriptionHtml:
Have you ever tried to start a diary but had no idea what to write?
Have you ever made up your mind to keep a diary but got disrupted by some trivial matters?
Did you find it difficult to benefit from the scattered entries?

## Keeping a diary is not supposed to be that hard.
Grid Diary introduced the simplest, the most powerful and the most effective way to keep a diary. From record to reflection, from reviewing life to knowing yourself, from planning goals to achieving a dream, Grid Diary is dedicated to maximizing the effectiveness of a diary.

## A Unique and Flexible Way of Journaling
With the help of Grid Diary's powerful grid templates and reflective prompts, you no longer need to worry about how to start. Grid Diary will help you focus on the aspects of life you want to track.

## Never Define You, Just Expect to be Defined by You
Grid Diary is not only a diary tool but also a mood tracker, self-growth journal, goal planner... More importantly, you can create a diary that best suits your individual needs through customizing your Grid Diary.

appDetails.developerAddress: No.13 Huaxin Road, Xiamen, Fujian, China

- Added export to PDF format (member only)
- Now you can batch export diaries
- Fixed the issue that some old models list rendering crash
- Other bug fixes and stability improvements

title: Grid Diary - Journal, Planner

container.value: No.13 Huaxin Road, Xiamen, Fujian, China

creator: Sumi Interactive
descriptionHtml:
Record mood, develop habits, improve productivity, wealth freedom, manage stress, self-care...
Have you ever thought that these challenges that every individual who wants to become a better version of themselves can be realized with just one tool?
Your journal contains power you never thought of.

# Grid Diary, to help you change your life and realize your dreams.
Grid Diary is committed to becoming the simplest, yet most powerful and effective personal growth tool. Since its first release in 2013, it has been fortunate to grow together with millions of users.
If you also want to make journaling as a lifelong habit, welcome to download Grid Diary and become one of us.

# Grid Diary, your ultimate personal diary system.
Whether you are a practitioner of morning diary, success diary, gratitude journal, or bullet journal, or simply want to record your feelings. Grid Diary provides rich tools such as template library, prompt library, habit check-in, writing reminder, etc. to help you customize the journal method that best suits your needs.

---

# Feature Highlights

1. Unique grid format
Grid Diary creates an original powerful and flexible grid format that focuses on things that are truly meaningful to you and helps you regain control of your life.

2. Professional writing guide library
Questions designed based on positive psychology will guide you to touch your true self. From the moment you write down an answer, you have already started to take the first step of transformation.

3. Day/week/month/year dimension
The rich time dimension makes your journal truly become the underlying system for personal growth. Choose your own rhythm to plan, act, and review. Build your own ritual. Break down and achieve your life goals step by step.

We believe that the journal is your private asset. In standalone mode, no private data will be uploaded to our server. If you choose to use the Grid Diary Sync Service, the data will be encrypted and stored on our server.
There is no venture capital and no advertisers behind Grid Diary. Our long-term development is based on the paid subscription of members. We never sell your data to third parties for profit.

title: Grid Diary - Journal, Planner

container.value: No.13 Huaxin Road, Xiamen, Fujian, China

creator: Sumi Interactive
descriptionHtml:
Google Play: Best app of 2020
"If you've wanted to journal but don't know where to start, meet Grid Diary. Swappable prompts in a lovely, flexible grid format invite you to record and reflect on life's happenings - from noting your habits and goals to sharing affirmation and gratitude."

---

Grid Diary is more than just a journaling app, but an everyday personal development system.

When it comes to personal growth, we want it all:

• Practicing mindfulness & self-love
• Building morning & evening routines
• Improving personal health & wellbeing
• Cultivating self-care habits
• Relieving stress and anxiety by changing your thought patterns (Cognitive Behavioral Therapy)
• Acquiring new skills
• Increasing productivity
• Maintaining good relationships
• Boosting creativity

and the list goes on.

We believe that personal development is not singular-focused, but rather, a holistic process.

In Grid Diary, you can fit all the desired areas of development in just one system, and reflect on them on a daily, weekly, monthly, and yearly basis.

# Feature Highlights

• Prompted Journaling: Guided Self-Reflections
Instead of starting on a blank page, prompt yourself with either the questions from our library or customized questions. This inspires deep self-reflection and saves you writers’ block.

• Unique Grid Format: Simple yet Holistic
Fit all the things that matter to you on one single page, in a grid format. This is a simple technique that helps you build a holistic personal development system. You can customize the grid layout to your own liking.

• Mandala Layout: Journal like a Mind Map
This 9-grid layout with one fixed center is inspired by the art of Mandala, a geometric pattern that represents the organizational structure of life and its relation to the cosmos. It makes journaling more intuitive and compatible with how our mind works- like a mind map.

• Day/week/month/year Dimension: Build Your Own Ritual
Rituals help us set anchors in time, a force that seems so uncontrollable yet makes up our whole life experiences. Build your own ritual and choose your own rhythm to plan, act, and review on a daily, weekly, monthly, or yearly basis.

• Compatible with Different Journal Methods
Do you follow the method of morning diary, success diary, manifestation journal, or bullet journal? With extensive flexibility, Grid Diary makes it easy for you to practice whatever method works for you.

---

As a three-person team, we believe that privacy is fundamental to a journaling app. There is no venture capital and no advertisers behind Grid Diary. Our long-term development is based on the paid subscription of members. We never sell your data to third parties for profit.

Privacy Policy

Terms of Service

creator: Sumi Interactive
descriptionHtml:
Google Play: Best app of 2020
"If you've wanted to journal but don't know where to start, meet Grid Diary. Swappable prompts in a lovely, flexible grid format invite you to record and reflect on life's happenings - from noting your habits and goals to sharing affirmation and gratitude."

---

Grid Diary is more than just a journaling app, but an everyday personal development system.

When it comes to personal growth, we want it all:

• Practicing mindfulness & self-love
• Building morning & evening routines
• Improving personal health & wellbeing
• Cultivating self-care habits
• Relieving stress and anxiety by changing your thought patterns (Cognitive Behavioral Therapy)
• Acquiring new skills
• Increasing productivity
• Maintaining good relationships
• Boosting creativity

and the list goes on.

We believe that personal development is not singular-focused, but rather, a holistic process.

In Grid Diary, you can fit all the desired areas of development in just one system, and reflect on them on a daily, weekly, monthly, and yearly basis.

# Feature Highlights

• Prompted Journaling: Guided Self-Reflections
Instead of starting on a blank page, prompt yourself with either the questions from our library or customized questions. This inspires deep self-reflection and saves you writers’ block.

• Unique Grid Format: Simple yet Holistic
Fit all the things that matter to you on one single page, in a grid format. This is a simple technique that helps you build a holistic personal development system. You can customize the grid layout to your own liking.

• Mandala Layout: Journal like a Mind Map
This 9-grid layout with one fixed center is inspired by the art of Mandala, a geometric pattern that represents the organizational structure of life and its relation to the cosmos. It makes journaling more intuitive and compatible with how our mind works- like a mind map.

• Day/week/month/year Dimension: Build Your Own Ritual
Rituals help us set anchors in time, a force that seems so uncontrollable yet makes up our whole life experiences. Build your own ritual and choose your own rhythm to plan, act, and review on a daily, weekly, monthly, or yearly basis.

• Compatible with Different Journal Methods
Do you follow the method of morning diary, success diary, manifestation journal, or bullet journal? With extensive flexibility, Grid Diary makes it easy for you to practice whatever method works for you.

---

As a three-person team, we believe that privacy is fundamental to a journaling app. There is no venture capital and no advertisers behind Grid Diary. Our long-term development is based on the paid subscription of members. We never sell your data to third parties for profit.

• Practicing mindfulness & self-love
• Building morning & evening routines
• Improving personal health & wellbeing
• Cultivating self-care habits
• Relieving stress and anxiety by changing your thought patterns (Cognitive Behavioral Therapy)
• Acquiring new skills
• Increasing productivity
• Maintaining good relationships
• Boosting creativity

and the list goes on.

We believe that personal development is not singular-focused, but rather, a holistic process.

In Grid Diary, you can fit all the desired areas of development in just one system, and reflect on them on a daily, weekly, monthly, and yearly basis.

# Feature Highlights

• Prompted Journaling: Guided Self-Reflections
Instead of starting on a blank page, prompt yourself with either the questions from our library or customized questions. This inspires deep self-reflection and saves you writers’ block.

• Unique Grid Format: Simple yet Holistic
Fit all the things that matter to you on one single page, in a grid format. This is a simple technique that helps you build a holistic personal development system. You can customize the grid layout to your own liking.

• Mandala Layout: Journal like a Mind Map
This 9-grid layout with one fixed center is inspired by the art of Mandala, a geometric pattern that represents the organizational structure of life and its relation to the cosmos. It makes journaling more intuitive and compatible with how our mind works- like a mind map.

• Day/week/month/year Dimension: Build Your Own Ritual
Rituals help us set anchors in time, a force that seems so uncontrollable yet makes up our whole life experiences. Build your own ritual and choose your own rhythm to plan, act, and review on a daily, weekly, monthly, or yearly basis.

• Compatible with Different Journal Methods
Do you follow the method of morning diary, success diary, manifestation journal, or bullet journal? With extensive flexibility, Grid Diary makes it easy for you to practice whatever method works for you.

---

As a three-person team, we believe that privacy is fundamental to a journaling app. There is no venture capital and no advertisers behind Grid Diary. Our long-term development is based on the paid subscription of members. We never sell your data to third parties for profit.

"If you've wanted to journal but don't know where to start, meet Grid Diary. Swappable prompts in a lovely, flexible grid format invite you to record and reflect on life's happenings - from noting your habits and goals to sharing affirmation and gratitude."

---

Record mood, develop habits, improve productivity, wealth freedom, manage stress, self-care...
Have you ever thought that these challenges that every individual who wants to become a better version of themselves can be realized with just one tool?
Your journal contains power you never thought of.

# Grid Diary, to help you change your life and realize your dreams.
Grid Diary is committed to becoming the simplest, yet most powerful and effective personal growth tool. Since its first release in 2013, it has been fortunate to grow together with millions of users.
If you also want to make journaling as a lifelong habit, welcome to download Grid Diary and become one of us.

# Grid Diary, your ultimate personal diary system.
Whether you are a practitioner of morning diary, success diary, gratitude journal, or bullet journal, or simply want to record your feelings. Grid Diary provides rich tools such as template library, prompt library, habit check-in, writing reminder, etc. to help you customize the journal method that best suits your needs.

---

# Feature Highlights

1. Unique grid format
Grid Diary creates an original powerful and flexible grid format that focuses on things that are truly meaningful to you and helps you regain control of your life.

2. Professional writing guide library
Questions designed based on positive psychology will guide you to touch your true self. From the moment you write down an answer, you have already started to take the first step of transformation.

3. Day/week/month/year dimension
The rich time dimension makes your journal truly become the underlying system for personal growth. Choose your own rhythm to plan, act, and review. Build your own ritual. Break down and achieve your life goals step by step.

We believe that the journal is your private asset. In standalone mode, no private data will be uploaded to our server. If you choose to use the Grid Diary Sync Service, the data will be encrypted and stored on our server.
There is no venture capital and no advertisers behind Grid Diary. Our long-term development is based on the paid subscription of members. We never sell your data to third parties for profit.

- biometric passcode (membership only)
- new timeline style

- Other bug fixes and stability improvements

If you like this update, we would greatly appreciate it if you rate the app on the Play Store. It means a lot to us!
If you have any suggestions or feedback, you can reach us at support at: support@griddiary.app. We would love to hear from you!

title:
Grid Diary - Journal, Planner
3.3.2

container.value: No.13 Huaxin Road, Xiamen, Fujian, China

creator: Sumi Interactive
descriptionHtml:
Google Play: Best app of 2020
"If you've wanted to journal but don't know where to start, meet Grid Diary. Swappable prompts in a lovely, flexible grid format invite you to record and reflect on life's happenings - from noting your habits and goals to sharing affirmation and gratitude."

---

Grid Diary is more than just a journaling app, but an everyday personal development system.

When it comes to personal growth, we want it all:

• Practicing mindfulness & self-love
• Building morning & evening routines
• Improving personal health & wellbeing
• Cultivating self-care habits
• Relieving stress and anxiety by changing your thought patterns (Cognitive Behavioral Therapy)
• Acquiring new skills
• Increasing productivity
• Maintaining good relationships
• Boosting creativity

and the list goes on.

We believe that personal development is not singular-focused, but rather, a holistic process.

In Grid Diary, you can fit all the desired areas of development in just one system, and reflect on them on a daily, weekly, monthly, and yearly basis.

# Feature Highlights

• Prompted Journaling: Guided Self-Reflections
Instead of starting on a blank page, prompt yourself with either the questions from our library or customized questions. This inspires deep self-reflection and saves you writers’ block.

• Unique Grid Format: Simple yet Holistic
Fit all the things that matter to you on one single page, in a grid format. This is a simple technique that helps you build a holistic personal development system. You can customize the grid layout to your own liking.

• Mandala Layout: Journal like a Mind Map
This 9-grid layout with one fixed center is inspired by the art of Mandala, a geometric pattern that represents the organizational structure of life and its relation to the cosmos. It makes journaling more intuitive and compatible with how our mind works- like a mind map.

• Day/week/month/year Dimension: Build Your Own Ritual
Rituals help us set anchors in time, a force that seems so uncontrollable yet makes up our whole life experiences. Build your own ritual and choose your own rhythm to plan, act, and review on a daily, weekly, monthly, or yearly basis.

• Compatible with Different Journal Methods
Do you follow the method of morning diary, success diary, manifestation journal, or bullet journal? With extensive flexibility, Grid Diary makes it easy for you to practice whatever method works for you.

---

As a three-person team, we believe that privacy is fundamental to a journaling app. There is no venture capital and no advertisers behind Grid Diary. Our long-term development is based on the paid subscription of members. We never sell your data to third parties for profit.

Privacy Policy
https://griddiaryapp.com/support/privacy

Terms of Service
https://griddiaryapp.com/support/terms
